name: Escape Znorlaxia
description:
Theme - Single-player co-op

Contorls:

Space - Jump
Up/Down - Raise/Lower gaps in shields.

For Weekly Game Jam #136
Sometimes doesn't load on firefox.

So it's been a while since I touched Godot so decided to make a quick game to remember it.

Story:

Your thrusters have been damaged in a successful daredevil mission against the Znorlaxians at their main base,which won't make escaping any easier.But your loyal AI friend volunteered to stay behind in their computer network and now has access to the defense system,which makes him able to generate and move small openings in their shields.The player must make his way out by maneuvering the ship and manipulating the enemys' defense systems.

Credits:

top/bottom art - https://opengameart.org/content/scifi-door
ship - https://opengameart.org/content/space-ship-2
pneumatic thruster sound - https://freesound.org/people/prnkys/sounds/437205/
